items.title: Automated discipline
items.description: Set your limits. The software monitors and alerts in real time to prevent you from going off track.

items.title: Robust Audio/Voice
items.description: pyttsx3 TTS re-initialized on each reading + portable backup beeps, even if your sound card disconnects.

items.title: International
items.description: EN/FR toggle without restart, designed for 4h–11h30 ET sessions and beyond.

items.title: Express setup

items.title: Security
items.description: Global error handling: crash log + message instead of quitting, to avoid bad surprises.

items.title: Updates
items.description: Quick fixes and continuous improvement based on feedback from active traders.

howItWorks.title: How it works
steps: Download and install the app (Windows installation assistant).
Select the P&L zone on your screen and test voice/beeps.
Set your rules: Max Loss, Drawdown, Daily Goal, Red→Green.
Let the app run; it alerts you immediately on breach.

questions.question: Can I change PC?
questions.answer: Yes, via support we can reset your license once per year.
